Developer Terms of Use
des:
Play a burp prank on your friends and family, or just listen to the sooting sounds of burps on your Alexa.

You can unlock premium features through the Premium Subscription.

It includes the following:

- Higher Sound Quality
- Burping sounds on infinite loop
